thread.title: Anti-ageing juice: carrot, sweet potato and turmeric
thread.title_full: Anti-ageing juice: carrot, sweet potato and turmeric - Telegraph

author: Elizabeth Peyton-Jones
title: Anti-ageing juice: carrot, sweet potato and turmeric
text: This recipe is mostly veg, which is much healthier and won’t give the body as much of a sugar shock as fruit. SERVES 1 INGREDIENTS 50g sweet potato 250g carrot 100g red pepper Juice of 1 lime ½ tsp ground turmeric METHOD Place all ingredients in a juicer, then drink. Cook Yourself Young by Elizabeth Peyton-Jones is published by Quadrille priced £14.99. To order your copy for £12.99 plus p&p call 0844 871 1514 or visit books.telegraph.co.uk Recipes to keep you youthful Spelt pizza with spring onions, artichokes and rosemary Spelt pizza Photo: YUKI SUGIURA Healthy thai fish curry Thai fish curry Photo: YUKI SUGIURA Healthy pecan pie Healthy pecan pie Photo: YUKI SUGIURA telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
